technique_name: 里合拍脚 Li Hé Pāi Jiǎo (Inward Slap Kick)
deduction_content: 膝关节弯曲 - Knee/s bent at the apex of the kick
支撑腿脚踝离地 - Heel of supporting leg off the floor

questions.question: What is the error code for Li Hé Pāi Jiǎo (Inward Slap Kick)?
What are the two main deduction points for Li Hé Pāi Jiǎo?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Knee/s are bent at the apex of the kick, and 2) Heel of supporting leg is off the floor.

questions.question: What is the correct leg position at the apex of Li Hé Pāi Jiǎo?
questions.answer: The leg should be completely straight at the apex of the kick with no bend in the knee.
